description: This is the root of the project. The purpose of this project is to illustrate the concept of lifting state up in React.

childNodes.description: This folder is used to hold React components
This renders a tree-like structure of the nodes in a `projectFiles.json` dataset.
This renders the description of a node in a `projectFiles.json` dataset.
These are the routes that render as distinct pages. The files here are React components.
This is not a distinct page. Rather, it is the default container component for the rendered page.
This is not a distinct page. Rather, it is the HTML template that is shared among all rendered pages.
This is the default page. It renders a `<Home>` component.
This is the global CSS styles loaded by the `_app.js`.
This is the linting standards for NextJS React Core.
This is the configuration for NextJS in this project
The is the root configuration for the Node project. Key parts of this include the `"dependencies"` and `"devDependencies"`
This is the JSON data for the project's files. I am describing myself. (How meta...)
